div.p: All procedures were approved by the Local Ethical Committee and the State Office for Environment Protection. We thank E. Wróblewska, A. Jaksa, D. Mańkowska, M. Janiszewska, and J. Białek for their help and consent to conducting research in the areas under their administration. We are grateful to T. Kurzac for his logistic help in the Botanic Garden. The study was founded by a grant from the Polish Ministry of Science and Higher Education No. N30404045136, by University of Łódź (No. 506/1145) and by grants for young researchers (2014: B1411000000760.02, 1455, 2015: B1511000001037.02, 2016: B1611000001212.02, 2017: B1711000001564.02). Our data is stored in the Big Data Archive in Department of Experimental Zoology and Evolutionary Biology, University of Łódź. M. Glądalski would like to thank Mark Mainwaring and Ian Hartley for many useful discussions about the breeding biology of blue tits and great tits. The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest. We are very grateful to three anonymous referees and the field editor for critical comments and constructive suggestions on the previous draft of the manuscript.
